title: Digital-Based Islamic Religious Education Module Development: 4D Model Application

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental Islamic doctrines and experience in using digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling and smartphone-centric accessibility considerations for working adult learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the procedure for performing Islamic prayer (Duha) with 90% accuracy through digital modules
Learners can identify symbolic elements of Islamic worship spaces with over 80% accuracy using VR simulations
Learners can provide feedback on the digital implementation suitability of Islamic educational content through module evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
